rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Serves as the transition from outdoor to indoor with a vestibule style design.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the west side for natural light and Vastu compliance. Minimalist aesthetic with clean lines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room; designed to complement the open space while maintaining a minimalist approach.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact and functional kitchen area with integrated storage solutions. Vastu alignment ensures proper directional flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Small bedroom with a private balcony and floor-to-ceiling windows on the west side for optimal natural light. Minimalist decor.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Well-ventilated area fitted with modern gym equipment; designed as a separate functional space within the ground floor.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: Utility and storage space for cleaning supplies and maintenance. Placed in an optimal corner following Vastu principles.
